definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: waste, wilderness;—abs. [[יְשִׁימוֹן]] 1Sa 23:19 + 5 t.; [[יְשִׁימׂן]] Nu 21:20 + 3 t.; [[יְשִׁמוֹן]] Is 43:19; [[יְשִׁמׂן]] De 32:10; cstr. [[יְשִׁימוֹן]] Ps 107:4; —waste, wilderness:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. art., alm. n.pr. Nu 21:20 (commanded by Pisgah), Nu 23:28 (by Pe‘or; both JE), frequented by David as an outlaw 1Sa 23:19, 1Sa 23:24, 1Sa 26:1, 1Sa 26:3. Probably some part of the wilderness of Judah, bordering on Dead Sea (Conder:Tent work, ch. 15; Buhl:Geogr. § 61); acc. to others, at least in Nu. (v. Di), part of the ‘Arábah, NE. of the Dead Sea (in which was [[בֵּית הַיְשִׁימׂת]] Nu 33:49 al.) b. without art., a waste  or wilderness (only poet.), of scene of Israel's wanderings (after the Exodus), ´[[בְּחׂהוּ יְלֵל יְשׁ]] De 32:10 (‖[[בְּאֶרֶץ מִדְבָּר]]), Ps 68:8, Ps 78:40, Ps 106:14; with ref. to returning exiles Is 43:19, Is 43:20; [[דֶּרֶךְ]] ´[[י]] Ps 107:4 waste of a way  ( = desert way).
